com.networking.UF

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.networking.UF.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    This Logger is a singleton that is intended to localize all logging logic. Any object in the program should be able to obtain the Logger instance and utilized the methods. The Logger.initializeDirectoriesAndFiles method must be called by the Peer object before any other work is done to ensure the application is ready to start.
    Author:
    Chris Falck

      • initializeDirectoriesAndFiles

        public static void initializeDirectoriesAndFiles(java.lang.Integer thisPeerId)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Creates all directories and files that will be used throughout the life of the program. Called once at the start of the program.
        Parameters:
        thisPeerId - The id of this peer. Used to initialize static variables and direcotory/file names.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
